about_the_game:
Ask GOD why he has made you so horrible


On an ordinary morning at the foot of the Tower of Babel, our protagonist, an amalgam, was sleeping very peacefully, when suddenly, a piece of mirror falls from the sky and hits him on the head, causing him to wake up.



The amalgam looks in all directions and realizes when looking at the ground the cause of its awakening.



Picking up one of the mirror fragments, the amalgam realizes that there is something moving in it. It took her a little while to realize that it was herself, after all, it was the first time she had seen her reflection. The amalgam could not believe that God had given it such a horrendous appearance.



At that moment she, indignant and angry with God's decision, decides to look at the top of the Tower of Babel and shout "Why God?!".
Since she doesn't respond, she decides to climb to the top of the tower to ask him face to face the reason for her ugliness.

Beauty Of The World


We are in a world with unique art, handmade and with very striking colors that will make you enjoy each statue or any element, because in this world everything is full of small details.



All in a 2D world and with a Cartoon and animated style in which you can get to know the particular and crazy personalities of the enemies while you enjoy the environment where they develop



The world and the lines that surround the universe of "Why God?" They stand out for the personality they have where it will be difficult for you to find
something similar anywhere else



If you like adventures with fast yet relaxed gameplay, if you feel like laughing a little while enjoying the simple and deep story. You'll enjoy "Why God?"

Fast Mechanics


Tired of having to gain inertia when swinging? here it is not necessary, take advantage of the instant impulses to have the possibility of
Run only forward while avoiding all enemies or eliminating them along the way.

With a kit of skills that grow as you play, giving more play to passing levels in more creative ways.

short_description: Climb high up the Tower of Babel by swinging and dodging all the children of the Lord to be able to ask GOD in one once and for all because he has made you so horrible in a world 2D cartoony. Explore in the most frenetic way the sad but exciting story of our little Amalgama.
